titles.title: Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan Expansion Act, Washington County, Utah
To provide for the expansion of the Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan, Washington County, Utah.
Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan Expansion Act, Washington County, Utah
Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan Expansion Act, Washington County, Utah

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 21 - 14.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-896.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 693.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan Expansion Act, Washington County, Utah
This bill expands the Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan to include additional habitat for the desert tortoise in Utah and recognizes a transportation and utility corridor in the Beaver Dam Wash National Conservation Area.
